content: Shares of Ashland Inc  look cheap and investors could reap major benefits from a planned spinoff of its Valvoline engine lubricants unit  according to an article in the latest edition of Barron's.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: Ashland shares could benefit amid Valvoline spinoff: Barron's

content: March 13 Shares of Ashland Inc look cheap and investors could reap major benefits from a planned spinoff of its Valvoline engine lubricants unit  according to an article in the latest edition of Barron's.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: Ashland shares could benefit amid Valvoline spinoff - Barron's

content: One of Ashland Inc's  largest shareholders is urging the chemical maker to halt plans to spin off its Valvoline business and instead seek a buyer for its specialty chemicals unit  according to a slide presentation seen by Reuters.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: Investor urges Ashland to halt Valvoline spinoff  sell specialty arm

content: Jan 20 One of Ashland Inc's largest shareholders is urging the chemical maker to halt plans to spin off its Valvoline business and instead seek a buyer for its specialty chemicals unit  according to a slide presentation seen by Reuters.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Investor urges Ashland to halt Valvoline spinoff  sell specialty arm

content: Jan 20 One of Ashland Inc's largest shareholders is urging the chemical maker to halt plans to spin off its Valvoline business and instead seek a buyer for its specialty chemicals unit  according to a slide presentation obtained by Reuters.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Ashland investor says halt Valvoline spinoff  sell specialty arm

content: Jan 19 Elmrox Investment Group LLC  one of the largest shareholders of Ashland Inc  is urging the chemical maker to halt plans to spin off its Valvoline business and instead seek a buyer for its specialty-chemicals unit  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing a presentation it reviewed.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: Shareholder urges Ashland to halt Valvoline spinoff -WSJ

content: Sept 22 Ashland Inc said it will spin off its engine lubricants unit into a publicly traded company  Valvoline  as it sheds assets that are not part of its core specialty chemicals business.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Chemicals maker Ashland to spin off engine lubricants unit

content: Sept 22 Specialty chemicals maker Ashland Inc  said it will spin off its engine lubricants unit into a publicly traded company  Valvoline  to focus on its higher margin businesses.
name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc
title: Chemicals maker Ashland to spin off engine lubricants unit
